content: this easy summer headband crochet pattern creates a beautiful practical and fashionable crochet headband perfect for the beach working out washing your face or to wear anytime this 30-min project uses only 35 yds of yarn and fits kids age 5+ teen girls and adults about this pattern - this is a very easy pattern with step-by-step instructions and a video tutorial - it s a super quick project as can make a headband in under 30 minutes approx - you only need approx 35 yds of any size 4 cotton yarn great for using scraps of leftover yarn - the pattern creates a headband that fits both kids age 5+ and adults - these summer headbands make wonderful gifts or great items to sell at craft shows
